translated: The reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in the inference for oneself.üîΩThe reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in the inference for oneself.üîΩThe reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in the inference for oneself.üîΩThe reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in the inference for oneself.üîΩThe reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in the inference for oneself.üîΩThe reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in the inference for oneself.üîΩThe reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in the inference for oneself.üîΩThe reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in the inference for oneself.üîΩThe reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in the inference for oneself.

original: rang bzhin gyi phyogs gcig ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i skye ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi phyogs gcig ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i skye ba'o //
translated: The reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in the inference for oneself.

original: cha ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i ste /
analyzed: cha ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i ste /
translated: The reason is the three characteristics of the reason explained in

original: cha cig shos rang bzhin gyi rtags kyi cha sgra brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i skye ba'o //
analyzed: cha cig shos rang bzhin gyi rtags kyi cha sgra brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i skye ba'o //
translated: The other part is the arising that occurs immediately after the sound of the sign of nature.

original: gal te 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi dbye ba nyid ci dgos she na /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi dbye ba nyid ci dgos she na /
translated: If it is asked why there is a division of result and nature,

original: gang med na mi 'byung ba yod pa'am zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang med na mi 'byung ba yod pa'am zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúIf something does not arise without it existing.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin tha dad pa dag med na mi 'byung ba yod pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad pa dag med na mi 'byung ba yod pa'o //
translated: If there is no difference in nature, it does not arise.

original: ldan pa can ni rjes su dbyug pa dang 'brel ba ste /
analyzed: ldan pa can ni rjes su dbyug pa dang 'brel ba ste /
translated: Possession is the connection of the subsequent stick.

original: tha dad pa'i 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i 'brel pa'o //
translated: The connection is different.

original: sogs pas ni 'du pa'i 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: sogs pas ni 'du pa'i 'brel pa ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúand so on‚Äù indicates the connection of aggregation.

original: de ni tha mi dad pa ltar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ni tha mi dad pa ltar byed pa'o //
translated: That is made to be undifferentiated.

original: gang yang don gcig la 'du ba ste gzhi gcig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang don gcig la 'du ba ste gzhi gcig par byed pa'o //
translated: That which is the same meaning is the single basis.

original: de 'dra ba'i 'brel ba ni med na mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i 'brel ba ni med na mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: That kind of connection is the nonarising of nonexistence.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩ'khrul pa srid pa can nyid phyir //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / 'khrul pa srid pa can nyid phyir //
translated: For that reason,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: it is said, ‚Äúbecause error is possible.‚Äù

original: mi dmigs pa'i zhes bya ba gtan tshigs yod na snang bar rung ba las ma dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i zhes bya ba gtan tshigs yod na snang bar rung ba las ma dmigs pa'o //
translated: Nonobservation is the nonobservation of something that is suitable to appear if the reason exists.

original: med pa ni bsgrub par bya ba ste med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba'o //
analyzed: med pa ni bsgrub par bya ba ste med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba'o //
translated: The non-existent is the probandum, i.e., the non-existent is suitable as a verbal expression.

original: mi dmigs pa las gzhan ma yin zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs las gzhan ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa las gzhan ma yin zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs las gzhan ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot different from non-apprehension‚Äù means not different from the logical mark.

original: gal te de lta na mi dmigs pa'i rtags kyis ci zhig sgrub ce na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na mi dmigs pa'i rtags kyis ci zhig sgrub ce na /
translated: If it is like that, what is established by the logical mark of non-apprehension?

original: de'i rgyu mtshan can shes pa dang sgra dag ste snang ba mi dmigs rgyu can gyi med pa'i tha snyad rmongs pa la bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan can shes pa dang sgra dag ste snang ba mi dmigs rgyu can gyi med pa'i tha snyad rmongs pa la bsgrub pa'o //
translated: The knowledge and words that have it as their reason, i.e., the verbal expression of non-existence that has non-apprehension of appearance as its cause is established for the ignorant.

original: ji ltar de bzhin du rtogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin du rtogs par bya zhe na /
translated: How is it to be understood in that way?

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyu yod pas 'bras bu yod par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyu yod pas 'bras bu yod par sgrub pa'o //
translated: This is the establishment of the existence of the effect by the existence of the cause.

original: 'di yi tha snyad grub 'gyur na //
analyzed: 'di yi tha snyad grub 'gyur na //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen its verbal expression is established‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni dpe la ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpe la ste /
translated: is in regard to the example.

original: sngon gnas khang na sbrul snang du rung ba mi dmigs pa'i med do zhes tha snyad du rung bar grub par 'gyur ba la'o //
analyzed: sngon gnas khang na sbrul snang du rung ba mi dmigs pa'i med do zhes tha snyad du rung bar grub par 'gyur ba la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the former abode, the non-apprehension of the snake that is suitable to appear is established as the verbal expression of ‚Äòit does not exist.‚Äô‚Äù

original: dpe la 'brel pa de grub pa la phyis yul gang na snang ba mi dmigs pa can de la yang yod na snang du rung ba las mi snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dpe la 'brel pa de grub pa la phyis yul gang na snang ba mi dmigs pa can de la yang yod na snang du rung ba las mi snang ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to establish that relationship with the example, it is said, ‚ÄúIf it exists in that place where the appearance is not observed, it should be observable, but it is not observable.‚Äù

original: med ba'i tha snyad du rung ba yin te gnas khang @256b bzhin no zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: med ba'i tha snyad du rung ba yin te gnas khang @256b bzhin no zhes brjod pas /
translated: Thus, it is suitable to designate it as nonexistent, like a house that does not exist.

original: snang ba mi dmigs pa de'i 'bras bu nyid blo sgra yang 'grub ste /
analyzed: snang ba mi dmigs pa de'i 'bras bu nyid blo sgra yang 'grub ste /
translated: Thus, the result of that nonobservation of appearance is also established as the cognition and the term.
